text: A singe won fan nu daxuɲa nan nabama. Yaamari matandimae nan nu won na. Won nu bara lɔɛ kira xɔn. Won nu bara bira won yɛtɛ waxɔnfe fɔxɔ ra a nun duniɲa fe mɔɔli birin fɔxɔ ra, han na nu bara won findi konyie ra. Won nu won ma duniɲa xaninma ɲaaxuɲa, tɔɔnɛ, gbɛsɛnxɔnnanteya, nun maraɲaaxuɲa nan kui. Won fan mu nu rafan mixie ma.
